thread.title: New York Mets-Los Angeles Dodgers in MLB Playoffs 2015: Live updates, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: New York Mets-Los Angeles Dodgers in MLB Playoffs 2015: Live updates, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: New York Mets-Los Angeles Dodgers in MLB Playoffs 2015: Live updates, how to watch live stream online
text:
The National League Division Series between the Los Angeles Dodgers and New York Mets is underway in Los Angeles.
The NL West-champion Dodgers have homefield advantage for the best-of-five series after finishing the regular season with a 92-70 record. The Mets won the NL East with a mark of 90-72.
Here are details on how to follow the game.
What : New York Mets (90-72) at Los Angeles Dodgers (92-70)
Where : Dodger Stadium, Los Angeles
When : Friday, October 9, at 6:45 p.m. PT/9:45 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online : Listen at ESPNRadio.com
Season series : Mets won 4-3
Pitching matchup : New York's Jacob DeGrom (14-8, 2.54 ERA) vs. Los Angeles' Clayton Kershaw (16-7, 2.13 ERA)
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
